resources.string:

The developer is not responsible for all errors.

We are not responsible for any translation errors.
We are not responsible for the misunderstanding of the Qur'an during reading and for all religious behaviors and situations that may arise from this misunderstanding.
The person himself is responsible for this situation.
The Quran Translations are taken from ebook.kuran.biz. \nSome icons in the application are taken from flaticon.com
